title: Deceased date of death
question: What was the date that {deceasedName} died?
questionHint: Use the date from the death certificate. For example, 30 01 2025

dod-day.required: Date of death must include a day
dod-day.invalid: Date of death must be a real date

dod-month.required: Date of death must include a month
dod-month.invalid: Date of death must be a real date

dod-year.required: Date of death must include a year
dod-year.invalid: Date of death must be a real date

dod-day-month.required: Date of death must include a day and month

dod-month-year.required: Date of death must include a month and year

dod-day-year.required: Date of death must include a day and year

dod-date.invalid: Date of death must be a real date
dod-date.dateInFuture: Date of death must be in the past
dod-date.dodBeforeDob: Date of death must be after {deceasedName}â€™s date of birth
